response.summary: Chemical Engineer with experience in Pharmaceutical and Cosmetic industry   in Quality assurance and Quality Control, Regulatory Affairs and Pharmacovigilance fields for orphan, Pain and ophthalmic medicines  products. Consistent achiever who develops, delivers, and manages operations through process improvement and building of QMS, according with GXP, Quality guidance’s ICH, ISO  13485 and 9001. Internal Auditor with experience in the direction, execution, evaluation and control, of  plans and compliance   with   management indicators. Achievement-oriented professional with a high sense of responsibility, analytic, ability to organize, prioritize and manage regulatory and quality activities, capacity for leadership of work teams and direct and effective communication. Faculty to innovate, design and improve chemical and physical transformation products. Proactive in the implementation of tasks, problem solving and ability to adapt to change. High degree of responsibility and commitment.
response.skills: Español, Inglés como lengua extranjera, Manejo SAP, Aspen Plus and Hysis, Microsoft Excel, Validación de procesos en la industria farmacéutica, Inglés, Analítico, Comunicación, Mejora de procesos, Análisis de datos, Capacidad de análisis, Procesos de garantía de calidad, TrackWise, Master control, e-learning , Alemán

profile_positions.description: Carrying out all activities related to the fulfilment of the quality standards of the products of Mundipharma Colombia S.A.S. and the Cluster (Chile, Ecuador, Peru) based on the current procedures of the Organization. On the other hand, Modifying and implement the Quality Management System for continuous improvement to guarantee the quality assurance. Fulfill local, global and any normative requirement related with GXP .
profile_positions.title: Coordinador de calidad-Regulatorio

profile_positions.description:
Management and implementation of the quality assurance. Release and quality control of cosmetic products.
Key Responsibilities
•Develop innovative cosmetic products
•Execution of internal audits and suppliers
•Management of Non-conformities
•Approval and physicochemical analysis of raw materials and finished products.
•Creation and implementation of quality management system procedures
•Finished product stability analysis
•Continuous staff training (> 10 people)
•Management and Presentation of management indicators
•Ensure compliance with technical-sanitary standards and the quality of finished products and raw materials.
•Monitor the maintenance of the department, facilities and the calibration of equipment andmeasuringinstruments.
Key Achievements
•Reengineering of processes and of Quality Management System
profile_positions.title: QUALITY COORDINATOR,

profile_positions.description:
Provide technical solutions to clients for the development of Functional Foods
Key Responsibilities
•Make formulations Dossiers for INVIMA technical package
•Receive audits from regulatory entities and clients
•Develop and innovate functional food grade products
•Carry out procedures and INVIMA renewals
•Implementation of research and development methodologies
•Nutritional labeling and approval of arts
profile_positions.title: Regulatory Affairs Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Preparation of sensory panel and physicochemical analysis for finished products
Key Achievements
•Designed and implemented an improvement plan for the application of the daily sensory panel and for thesensorytraining of raw materials.
•Analyzed sequential results through statistical tests to optimize the sensory capacity of the flavor analysts.
•Coordinated the sensory training in the aromas of raw materials to differentiate the organolepticproperties of each chemical family.
profile_positions.title: QUALITY ASSISTANT (QUALITY AND REGULATORY),

company.name: Mundipharma
company.description:
Mundipharma is a global healthcare company with a presence across Africa, Asia Pacific, Canada, Europe, Latin America, and the Middle East.

Mundipharma is dedicated to bringing innovative treatments to patients in the areas of Pain Management, Infectious Disease and Consumer Healthcare as well as other severe and debilitating disease areas.

Our guiding principles, centred around Integrity and Patient-Centricity, are at the heart of everything we do.  We encourage our people to think differently and our inclusive culture of continuous learning and collaboration make Mundipharma a great place to work.  

For more information visit www.mundipharma.com

See our community guidelines: mundipharma.com/social-media-community-guidelines
